Description: Pale buff ware pottery vase with four perforated handles projecting from the sides of the convex body. One handle broken. Flat base and narrow neck; rim chipped at mouth.
Curator's comments: Published: R Friedman 'Badari Grave Group 569' in W. V. Davies (ed), Studies in Egyptian Antiquities: A Tribute to T. G. H. James (BM Occasional Paper 123, 1999), 1-11.
Condition: good. Part of one handle missing.
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
